entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:40 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:40 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:40 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
